name: WKHTTPCookieStore
desc: An object that manages the HTTP cookies associated with a particular web view.

items.name: func getAllCookies(([HTTPCookie]) -> Void)
items.desc: Fetches all stored cookies asynchronously and delivers them to the specified completion handler.

items.name: func setCookie(HTTPCookie, completionHandler: (() -> Void)?)
items.desc: Adds a cookie to the cookie store.

items.name: func add(WKHTTPCookieStoreObserver)
items.desc: Adds an observer to the cookie store.

items.name: func remove(WKHTTPCookieStoreObserver)
items.desc: Removes an observer from the cookie store.

items.name: protocol WKHTTPCookieStoreObserver
items.desc: The methods to adopt in an object that monitors changes to a webpageâ€™s cookies.
